title: San Bernardino County, California
summary: San Bernardino County, officially the County of San Bernardino, is a county located in the southern portion of the U.S. state of California, and is located within the Inland Empire area. As of the 2010 U.S. Census, the population was 2,035,210,[3] making it the fifth-most populous county in California and the 14th-most populous in the United States. The county seat is San Bernardino.[5]
